arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari 0-2 Bologna: Rossoblu get first away victory
arts.sum: Bologna climbed the table with their first away win in Cagliari, sealed thanks to Emil...

There have been 39 official meetings between the sides in Sardinia: 18 home wins for Cagliari, 14 draws, and 7 victories for Bologna. In the last eight Serie A encounters played in Cagliari, the hosts have lost only once: 0 to 2 on 29 October 2024.

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Bologna - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Bologna, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
